languages.text: "И даже более того — из тени {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}руководить{/d} самим миром. Думаете, это достойная участь для ваших собратьев по расе — стать невольниками в лапах ксеносов? Действительно ли вы полагаете, что они будут чтить условия какой бы то ни было сделки, заключенной с вами?"

"And more than that — to let them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}run{/d} the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"
languages.original_text: "И даже более того — из тени {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}руководить{/d} самим миром. Думаете, это достойная участь для ваших собратьев по расе — стать невольниками в лапах ксеносов? Действительно ли вы полагаете, что они будут чтить условия какой бы то ни было сделки, заключенной с вами?"

traits.locale_text: "And more than that — let them run the world itself from the shadows. Do you think that it is a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

"And more than that — let them run the world itself from the shadows. Do you think that it is a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

"And more than that — to let them run the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

"And more than that — to let them run the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

languages.text: 「それとだ…異種族に影ながらあの星を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}統治{/d}させているな？異種族の手中で奴隷として生きることが、同胞の人類にとって価値ある運命とでも？異種族はどんな取引でも守ると、本気で思っているのか？」
languages.original_text: "And more than that — to let them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}run{/d} the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

traits.locale_text: 「それとだ…異種族に影ながらあの星を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}統治{/d}させているな？異種族の手中で奴隷として生きることが、同胞の人類にとって価値ある運命とでも？異種族はどんな取引でも守ると、本気で思っているのか？」

languages.original_text: "And more than that — to let them run the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

languages.text: “而且不仅如此，你居然还允许他们躲在暗处，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}掌控{/d}着那个世界？莫非你认为，你的人类同胞理应成为异形魔爪下的农奴？莫非你真的相信，那些异形会信守他们对你的承诺？”
languages.original_text: "And more than that — to let them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}run{/d} the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

traits.locale_text: “而且不仅如此，你居然还允许他们躲在暗处，掌控着那个世界？莫非你认为，你的人类同胞理应成为异形魔爪下的农奴？莫非你真的相信，那些异形会信守他们对你的承诺？”

languages.text: «Más aún: ¿les permite {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}gobernar{/d} el mundo entero desde las sombras? ¿Cree que los otros humanos merecen sufrir como esclavos en manos de los xenos? ¿O de verdad cree que los xenos honrarán el acuerdo al que han llegado con usted?».
languages.original_text: "And more than that — to let them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}run{/d} the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

traits.locale_text: «Más aún: ¿les permite gobernar el mundo entero desde las sombras? ¿Cree que los otros humanos merecen sufrir como esclavos en manos de los xenos? ¿O de verdad cree que los xenos honrarán el acuerdo al que han llegado con usted?».

languages.text: « Pire encore, vous leur avez permis de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}diriger{/d} ce monde depuis les ombres. Vos semblables méritent-ils vraiment de vivre comme des esclaves entre les griffes des xénos ? Croyez-vous vraiment que ces créatures vont honorer leur part du marché ? »
languages.original_text: "And more than that — to let them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}run{/d} the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

traits.locale_text: « Pire encore, vous leur avez permis de diriger ce monde depuis les ombres. Vos semblables méritent-ils vraiment de vivre comme des esclaves entre les griffes des xénos ? Croyez-vous vraiment que ces créatures vont honorer leur part du marché ? »

languages.text: "Und mehr noch – sie diese Welt aus den Schatten {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}regieren{/d} zu lassen? Haltet Ihr es für ein würdiges Schicksal Eurer Mitmenschen, als Knechte in den Klauen von Xenos zu leben? Glaubt Ihr wirklich, dass die Xenos eine wie auch immer geartete Vereinbarung mit Euch einhalten werden?"
languages.original_text: "And more than that — to let them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}run{/d} the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Und mehr noch – sie diese Welt aus den Schatten beherrschen zu lassen? Haltet Ihr es für ein würdiges Schicksal Eurer Mitmenschen, als Knechte in den Klauen von Xenos zu leben? Glaubt Ihr wirklich, dass die Xenos eine wie auch immer geartete Vereinbarung mit Euch einhalten werden?"

languages.text: "Bunun da ötesinde, direkt olarak gölgelerden dünyayı {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}yönetmelerine{/d} müsaade etmendeki? İnsan soydaşların, zenoların avucunun içinde köle olarak yaşamayı hak ediyorlar mı sence? Zenoların yaptığınız anlaşmaya uyacağına gerçekten inanıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "And more than that — to let them {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}run{/d} the world itself from the shadows? Do you think it a worthy fate for your fellow human beings to live as thralls in the clutches of xenos? Do you truly believe that the xenos will honour whatever deal they made with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Bunun da ötesinde, direkt olarak gölgelerden dünyayı yönetmelerine müsaade etmendeki? İnsan soydaşların, zenoların avucunun içinde köle olarak yaşamayı hak ediyorlar mı sence gerçekten? Zenoların seninle yaptıkları anlaşmaya uyacaklarına gerçekten inanıyor musun?"
